categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Keldroth was a Human female Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of Belsavis, Keldroth was part of the Imperial forces that established the Imperial Lodgement in the Minimum Security Section on Belsavis, and shared her skills with other Sith.
Lord Keldroth appears as the class trainer for the Sith Inquisitor on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
